question.para: Perl fails with "*** missing separator. Stop."

answer.para: It's missing a device file. (AFAIK, /dev/null, but maybe /dev/zero.) Anyway, either you forgot to run MAKEDEV, or MAKEDEV failed, or you're using devfs and forgot to mount --bind it under $LFS.
If MAKEDEV failed, often all the device's names will end with a "-". AFAIK, this happens when MAKEDEV is run without $LFS/proc mounted.
The devices should look exactly like this: sk@bubook:~ $ ls -l /dev/{null,zero} crw-rw-rw- 1 root root 1, 3 Dec 31 1969 /dev/null crw-rw-rw- 1 root root 1, 5 Dec 31 1969 /dev/zero sk@bubook:~ $
